listeningComprehension.name: Listening Comprehension
listeningComprehension.description: Listen to a passage and answer multiple choice questions

questions.question: Listen to the following passage about remote work trends and answer the questions
questions.storyText: The shift to remote work has fundamentally transformed the modern workplace. Companies worldwide have discovered that employees can maintain high productivity levels while working from home. This transition has led to reduced overhead costs, improved work-life balance, and access to a global talent pool. However, it has also presented challenges such as maintaining team cohesion, ensuring effective communication, and managing digital security. Many organizations are now adopting hybrid models that combine the benefits of both remote and in-office work. Technology platforms for video conferencing, project management, and collaborative tools have become essential infrastructure. The future of work is likely to be more flexible, with companies offering various work arrangements to attract and retain top talent.
